short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A series of ehancements to your Giant Bomb browsing experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Giant Bomb experience with the following features:
- Reconfigured homepage with user customization and a new "recently played" section.
- Add individual videos to your Watchlist
- Enable the Light theme.

Must be a Giant Bomb user and authenticate to use this extension.
